item.description:
Hi folks! Let's get together to celebrate the infant-hood of spring while we walk and talk with a group of friends. This Meetup will take place at Sleeping Giant State Park which is a state park located in Hamden, CT. This hike usually takes less than two hours.

$2 suggested DONATION: Please note that members who arrive without donations for any reason have always been welcomed with warmth and without question.

WHEN AND WHERE: As usual, plan to arrive five minutes early.

Meet at the big trail map at 11:55 or 12:00 and head out at five after.

DIRECTIONS: Please see Sleeping Giant State Park website.
item.how_to_find_us: Sarah (Organizer) will meet you by the big trail map.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: Last-minute Walk at Sleeping Giant
